Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.addressing.pdef

Handles partner definitions and addressing across all BPEL processes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAePartnerAddressBook Wraps all of the parnter definitions for a given principal.
IAePartnerAddressingAdmin Administration interface into the partner definition addressing layer.
IAePartnerAddressingFactory Factory interface for accessing the IAePartnerAddressingProvider.
IAePartnerAddressingProvider Interface for accessing, modifying the partner address definition layer.
IAePartnerDefInfo Describes a partner definition.
 

Class Summary
AeDefaultPartnerAddressingFactory Returns the AeDefaultPartnerAddressingProvider.
AeDefaultPartnerAddressingProvider Default partner addressing provider.
AePartnerAddressBook Default container for all partner definitions mapped to a principal.
AePartnerAddressingFactory Base class for accessing the parnter addressing factory impls.
AePartnerAddressRef This class models the mapping of a parnterLinkType and role to endpoint reference.
AePartnerDefInfo Default implementation of the IAePartnerDef info.
AeXmlPartnerDefInfoReader Utility class for reading in pdef xml files.
 

Exception Summary
AePartnerAddressingException General exception for partner definition addressing layer.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.addressing.pdef Description

Handles partner definitions and addressing across all BPEL processes. Includes a utility class for reading in pdef XML files.

A partner definition is defined by a principal, partner link types, a role name, and an endpoint reference. These classes act as an "address book" for all partner definitions across all BPEL processes.
